2025-03.title: is it true hardly anyone uses facebook anymore and it is becoming a relic
did anybody else notice their algorithm on facebook long before the us election
2025-03.body:
ive heard a lot of people saying that following trump becoming president their usual facebook feed has been replaced with protrump and antilgbtq propaganda memes 

but wondering if anyone else noticed their algorithm changing at some point last year a while before the election

for a long time facebook has been annoyingly good at predicting what i want to see and i would have endless reels of the content i like

then one day i opened facebook and it just seemed completely random it was almost like the platform has been reset to before algorithms were even invented i thought it was odd but it didnt really bother me i dont want tailored content sucking me in for hours so i just ignored it

now in light of myself and others being bombarded consistently with far right memes looking back it seems like meta disabled algorithms months and months ago in preparation for rebuilding it in the vision of the third reich i mean far right

2025-03.title: if there a reason why facebook suggests friends to me only to tell me i probably dont know them and cant send a friend request
2025-03.body: 99 of the time i do indeed know them

2025-03.title: dear mark zuckerberg you owe me 11275 meta is restricting monetization and withholding past earnings from creators
can see friends on old account but not on new one does anyone know why it is like that
2025-03.body:
hello
i have recently made a new account on fb what i found out is for some reason if i look at a random persons account i can see his her friends in the list but its completley gone on the new account for me its not a big deal but it sure annoys me in some way  does anyone know why or have the same issue

2025-03.title: regarding messages from blocked accounts can everyone still see the messages
2025-03.body: is there a way that you can delete an entire message thread in messenger so that the other person no longer has access to that whole conversation i am asking since it seems that even if you block someone both parties can still see the whole messages

2025-03.title: there is a random blank bar popping up when trying to comment on posts
2025-03.body: does anyone know how to stop this from happening it happens nearly every time i comment  its really annoying and im unable to click anything under the bar  like the publish comment arrow

2025-03.title: is anyone else having issues with stories showing up on the messenger app
2025-03.body:
the last week or so i began noticing that stories show on and off on my messenger app so it will show for lets say the first 4 hours after its posted on my ios messenger app then it stops meanwhile the first 4 hours it wont show on my android phone on the messenger app and then once it disappears off ios it begins to show on my android then it switches and vice versa i checked and they are viewable on both my phones fb apps and desktop but i dont understand what is happening on messenger is it a glitch i dont think its an issue with the download as its happening on and off to all 3 phones and its not a block or restriction as ive tested it with my friend who posted the story just so i could test it and it still happens so im not really sure whats happening does anyone have any idea or have had any similar sort of issue any help would be appreciated

my ios which was showing the story a few minutes ago



vs my android which is still showing the story

2025-03.title: the messenger app is almost unusable now  full of bugs crashes freezing etc
2025-03.body:
recently the app has been very buggy it doesnt send messages doesnt give notifications when i receive a new message sometimes sends notifications of messages ive already read and will not load messages or photos when i open a chat the list of chats doesnt seem to stay up to date the only way to solve this is to completely restart the app which means you loose messages youve just tried to send its infuriating

my friends ae having the sqme issues android

2025-03.title: is there any way to permanently remove hate speechbigotryrightwing unwanted content from my facebook feed
2025-03.body:
im tired of clicking not interested and hide all from x every time hateful content appears on my feed i dont engage with these posts besides hiding them i dont comment on them i dont react to them hell i dont even open these as i know kinda how the algorithm works
ok i hide them but this kind of posts keep coming back in different pages i hide all posts from a particular page and then all of sudden im bombarded with hateful content from another five pages i havent blocked yet  
i wouldnt really mind having some rightwing suggested content if it wasnt only  sexist racist homophobic transphobic and all types of hateful memes that do not cater to my values

is this something intentional on the facebook part or does the algorithm really think im a 60 years old trump supporter

2025-03.title: does posting on facebook to combat fox news newsmax and the white house do any good
2025-03.body: i have a fake account on facebook that i use to combat the propaganda that the right wing news organizations spread i make it abundantly clear that its a fake account i look at it as electronic graffiti i comment with posts about trumps meme coin rug pull the january 6th insurrection  or his big lie for example i get the occasional go away troll but my hope is that maybe that one person will see that the wool has been pulled over their eyes has anyone else tried to take on the right wing propaganda machine this way more importantly do you think it might do more harm than good in some way

2025-02.title: laidoff meta employees blast zuckerberg in forums for running the cruelest tech company out there
my dad keeps posting pictures of my baby on his public facebook without my consent
2025-02.body: how can i get my dads facebook posts with my baby deleted he keeps posting angry political stuff and then posting photos of my baby and reposting photos from when she was a newborn he has like 800 friends and gets a lot of interaction with his posts and a lot of his friends are weirdos and actual pervs hes a major narcissist and doesnt care if i ask him to take them down i stopped sending him pictures of my baby after i realized he was posting them i dont even post pictures of my babies face on my own social media i dont want her plastered all over his stupid page what do i do this is really bothering me i tried reporting but theres no option for this specific issue

2025-01.title: meta under fire for autofollowing trump  vance blocking democrat hashtags
mark zuckerberg helping to institute a nationwide abortion ban gilead inching closer to fruition
meta has agreed to pay 25 million after being sued by donald trump for suspending his accounts following the jan 6 attack on the capitol
meta denies forcing accounts to follow donald trump claims hiding democrat hashtags is a bug  users arent convinced
meta mark zuckerberg youre going to continue to bash the lgbtq what did the lgbtq ever do to you
2025-01.body:
any of you supporting this disgust me 

this is gonna be allowed specifically lgbtq 

why is this being allowed 

what a piece of shit guy to allow people to disrespect people based on their sexuality 

why are other people so concerned with other peoples lifestyles 


boycottmeta

2024-07.title: how is this even  fair   all i did was share the 2024 olympic games  satanic monstrosities and you banned me its not my nudity but what we were forced to watch on television i switched of so that kids dont need to see this

2020-11.title: important psa if someone on reddit sends you a message or chat saying they can help get your account back and will want your login information this is a scam take a screenshot and report it to the reddit admins and send a modmail to us
2020-11.body:
please note the mod team at rfacebook is in no way shape or form associated with facebook  we cannot help you with anything facebook related

nbsp

i understand the desperation some of you have when you have issues with facebook  their automated process to suspend an account can end up flagging many people with legitimate accounts  so when you post looking for help here there will be some people that will take advantage of this fact and reach out to you here at reddit

i can assure you anyone telling you they can help hack their way into getting your service back are not here to help  they are here to get your personal information period  do not fall for this  take a screenshot

 you can report it to the admins at 
 you can send us modmail by clicking this link
   we require a screenshot  in windows you can click on the windows key and type snip to use the snip tool
   go to 
   provide us that link
